title: How to Bake an Easy Applesauce Cake

steps.headline: Grease a Bundt or tube pan.
Add cake mix and beat eggs to a large mixing bowl.
Add applesauce to egg mixture and stir well.
Pour batter into the prepared cake pan.
Bake 30 to 40 minutes or until the cake tests done.
Cool 15 minutes and then place a dinner plate on top of pan.
Sprinkle top of cake with cinnamon-sugar mixture.

text: Preheat oven to 350 °F (177 °C).  Grease a Bundt or tube pan.  Beat eggs in a bowl.  Add cake mix and beat eggs to a large mixing bowl.  Beat well.  Add applesauce to egg mixture and stir well.  Pour batter into the prepared cake pan.  Bake 30 to 40 minutes or until the cake tests done.  Cool 15 minutes and then place a dinner plate on top of pan.  Turn cake out onto plate.  Sprinkle top of cake with cinnamon-sugar mixture.  Let cool and then serve.
